        <item>

        </item>
        <item>

            <link><![CDATA[https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/pressreleases/other20260129a.htm]]></link>
            <guid><![CDATA[https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/pressreleases/other20260129a.htm]]></guid>
            <description><![CDATA[Federal Reserve Board announces appointment of seven members, including four new members, to its Insurance Policy Advisory Committee (IPAC)]]></description>

            <pubDate><![CDATA[Thu, 29 Jan 2026 18:30:00 GMT]]></pubDate>    
        </item>

        </item>
        <item>

title: FDA Press Releases RSS Feed
content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<rss xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" version="2.0" xml:base="http://www.fda.gov/">
  <channel>
    <title>FDA Press Releases RSS Feed</title>
    <link>http://www.fda.gov/</link>
    <description/>
    <language>en</language>
    
    <item>
  <title>FDA Launches PreCheck Pilot Program to Strengthen Domestic Pharmaceutical Manufacturing</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-launches-precheck-pilot-program-strengthen-domestic-pharmaceutical-manufacturing</link>
  <description>The U.S. Food and Drug Administration today began accepting requests to participate in the FDA PreCheck pilot program.</description>
  <pubDate>Sun, 01 Feb 2026 10:13:23 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-launches-precheck-pilot-program-strengthen-domestic-pharmaceutical-manufacturing</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>FDA ImportShield Program Delivers Impressive Results in Strengthening FDA Oversight at U.S. Ports of Entry</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-importshield-program-delivers-impressive-results-strengthening-fda-oversight-us-ports-entry</link>
  <description>The U.S. Food and Drug Administration today announced its initial review of the effectiveness of the FDA ImportShield Program (FISP), which launched in August 2025 to modernize how the FDA reviews imported products.</description>
  <pubDate>Wed, 21 Jan 2026 10:00:09 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-importshield-program-delivers-impressive-results-strengthening-fda-oversight-us-ports-entry</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>FDA Takes Steps to Improve Gluten Ingredient Disclosure in Foods</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-takes-steps-improve-gluten-ingredient-disclosure-foods</link>
  <description>Today, the U.S. Food and Drug Administration issued a Request for Information (RFI) regarding labeling and preventing cross-contact of gluten in packaged food.</description>
  <pubDate>Wed, 21 Jan 2026 09:33:29 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-takes-steps-improve-gluten-ingredient-disclosure-foods</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>FDA Approves First Treatment for Children With Menkes Disease</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-approves-first-treatment-children-menkes-disease</link>
  <description>The U.S. Food and Drug Administration today approved the Zycubo (copper histidinate) injection as the first treatment for Menkes disease in pediatric patients.</description>
  <pubDate>Mon, 12 Jan 2026 17:00:55 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-approves-first-treatment-children-menkes-disease</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>FDA Issues Guidance on Modernizing Statistical Methods for Clinical Trials </title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-issues-guidance-modernizing-statistical-methods-clinical-trials</link>
  <description>The U.S. Food and Drug Administration today published draft guidance designed to facilitate the use of Bayesian methodologies in clinical trials of drugs and biologics, helping drug developers make better use of available data, conduct more efficient clinical trials, and deliver safe and effective t</description>
  <pubDate>Mon, 12 Jan 2026 09:39:04 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-issues-guidance-modernizing-statistical-methods-clinical-trials</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>FDA Increases Flexibility on Requirements for Cell and Gene Therapies to Advance Innovation</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-increases-flexibility-requirements-cell-and-gene-therapies-advance-innovation</link>
  <description>The U.S. Food and Drug Administration today announced it is sharing information about the agency’s flexible approach to overseeing chemistry, manufacturing and control (CMC) requirements for cell and gene therapies (CGT).</description>
  <pubDate>Sun, 11 Jan 2026 15:03:23 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-increases-flexibility-requirements-cell-and-gene-therapies-advance-innovation</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>FDA Finds Insufficient Data to Determine Safety of PFAS in Cosmetic Products</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-finds-insufficient-data-determine-safety-pfas-cosmetic-products</link>
  <description>The U.S. Food and Drug Administration today released a congressionally  mandated report under the
